name: Dual Sympathy
description:
Dual Sympathy is about adventure. Players, as a knight,  engage in battles by tapping beats. After taking challenges from the dark forest, dungeons, and the lost gate, the knight learns to regain the courage for life.

Developer:

Programmer | Luty Lu, Raymond Wu, Jiajun Huang

Artist | Daniel Lin, Fan Zhang, Echo Huang

Musician | Ray Huang

Designer | Echo Huang
